message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to offer it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I can offer the product to you for $160.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Can you consider that?
I'm getting a bit closer to your price, but I still need to make a profit. I can do $155, that's the lowest I can go.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $145?
I'm not willing to go below $155, but I'm willing to make a compromise. I can meet you at $152, that's the best I can do.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $148?
I'm not willing to go below $152, it's my minimum price. I'm willing to sell it to you for that, but that's as low as I can go.
I understand you're not willing to go any lower, but I'm really interested in the product. Can you meet me at $149?
